title: Looking to buy T205 Marquard, lower grade
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking to buy T205 Marquard, lower grade
posts.post_content:
Have always wanted to add the T205 Rube Marquard to my HOF collection... love that image from Glory of Their Times (which I'm reading again now!).

Hoping to find a budget friendly, centered version - will be looking in AC this week too.

PM me if you have a decent dupe to sell!

Thanks

Jeff
